Articles.Content:
You know a game is good when it has a button that can be pronounced as "sass". but what if we took that to the next level, and actually added that extra s to the SAS button? Maybe when you turned it on, the kerbals in your ship could all make sassy snapping gestures, too!

Also, i think there should be a "twerk" button that disables the new fancy SAS and re-enables the pre-0.21 wobbly-rocket SAS.

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/129/577/1a4.jpg
2.3 Forbidden Messages

c. Messages that only contain images in response to a certain subject dependent to the context of the thread (ie. reaction images);

This is a really weird suggestion though...
